header.title: Alice: Crypto Finance
header.lead1: Save crypto to get compound interest.
header.lead2: Reserve now and benefit from annual interest rate of 8%!

services.title: Features
services.service1.title: Savings - 8% APR
services.service1.desc: Deposit stable coins and get annual interest of 8% continuously.
services.service2.title: Instant Loan - 3 seconds
services.service2.desc: Borrow stable coins instantly with the lowest interest rate. Coins are offered instantly.
services.service3.title: Exchange - Reliable
services.service3.desc: Can you trust centralized exchanges? Blockchain secures your assets safely.
services.service4.title: Custody - Decentralized
services.service4.desc: Only YOU can get access to your assets so they belong to you at any time.

features.feature1.title: Secured by blockchain
features.feature1.desc: Alice is backed by its own blockchain. It protects your assets at the highest level of security.
features.feature2.title: Intuitive and convenient
features.feature2.desc: It offers the best user experience for trading, borrowing and lending assets.
features.feature3.title: Super performant
features.feature3.desc: DPoS consensus algorithm, which operates Alice's blockchain, provides both security and performance.

contentFirst.title: Compound SAVINGS of 8% APR
contentFirst.desc: Alice offers savings service to help you increase your assets most effectively. Deposit DAI stable coins and get 8% of APR every year. There's no limit to the amount of deposit and you can withdraw your savings at any time you want! (APR : Annual Percentage Rate)

contentSecond.title: Instant LOAN in 3 seconds
contentSecond.desc: With Alice, you can get an instant loan in less than 3 seconds. First, deposit tokens as collateral which you believe whose price will increase. Then, you will get paid for your DAI stable coins. Use your DAI and pay it back whenever you want!

contentThird.title: EXCHANGE with Reliability
contentThird.desc: While depositing your precious crypto assets into exchanges, can you trust them? Centralized exchanges are exposed to possible thefts and operating risks. Meanwhile, on decentralized exchanges you don't have to trust anyone. Blockchain secures your assets from any threats.

subscription.title: Reservation
subscription.desc: Reserve now and get the benefit of savings of 8% ARP. DAI savings open at late May 2019.
